feed.title: ifo
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: ethemodetail
entry.content:
以太坊改良

比特派会针对每一个可能的分叉做技术处理，并在分叉真正成功、主网上线稳定运行一段时间之后支持该分叉币的提取。

项目方临时宣布已于高度4730666分叉。

项目名 Ethereum Modification（EMO）以太坊改良
分叉高度 4730666(以太坊高度)
分叉时间 2017年12月14日
重放保护 未公布
挖矿算法 未公布
是否预挖 未公布
分叉币数量比例 1:1
总量 105000000
项目官网 未公布
项目团队 LighitingASIC
其他信息
entry.summary: 以太坊改良 比特派会针对每一个可能的分叉做技术处理，并在分叉真正成功、主网上线稳定运行一段时间之后支持该分叉币的提取。 项目方临时宣布已于高度4730666分叉。 项目名 Ethereum Modification（EMO）以太坊改良 分叉高度 4730666(以太坊高度) 分叉时间 2017年12月14日 重放保护 未公布 挖矿算法 未公布 是否预挖 未公布 分叉币数量比例 1:1 总量 105000000 项目官网 未公布 项目团队 LighitingASIC 其他信息

entry.title: emofogdetail
entry.content:
Ethereum Fog

Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim.

Project name Ethereum Modification(EMO)
Block height 4730660
Hard-fork time 2017/12/14
Replay protection Unknown
Mining algorithm Unknown
Pre-mining Unknown
Ratio to ETH 1:1
Total supply 105000000
Official Website Unknown
Project Team LighitingASIC
entry.summary: Ethereum Fog Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim. Project name Ethereum Modification(EMO) Block height 4730660 Hard-fork time 2017/12/14 Replay protection Unknown Mining algorithm Unknown Pre-mining Unknown Ratio to ETH 1:1 Total supply 105000000 Official Website Unknown Project Team LighitingASIC

entry.title: bcsdetail
entry.content:
Bitcoin Smart

Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim.

Bitpie will support to claim BCS after BCS mainnet is launched.

Bitcoin Smart(BCS) is an experiment to improve Bitcoin , with integration of smart-contract, new features such as token issuance will be available on Bitcoin and onchain performance will no longer be a issue.

Project name Bitcoin Smart（BCS）
Block height 505050
Hard-fork time 2018/1/20
Total supply 21亿
Blocktime 10 min
Difficulty adjustment DAA
Block size 8M
Segwit Support
Consensus mechanism Equi Hash(GPU)
Official Website http://bcs.info
Project Team BCS Team
entry.summary: Bitcoin Smart Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim. Bitpie will support to claim BCS after BCS mainnet is launched. Bitcoin Smart(BCS) is an experiment to improve Bitcoin , with integration of smart-contract, new features such as token issuance will be available on Bitcoin and onchain performance will no longer be a issue. Project name Bitcoin Smart（BCS） Block height 505050 Hard-fork time 2018/1/20 Total supply 21亿 Blocktime 10 min Difficulty adjustment DAA Block size 8M Segwit Support Consensus mechanism Equi Hash(GPU) Official Website http://bcs.info Project Team BCS Team

entry.title: bcsdetail
entry.content:
比特智能

比特派已经跟BCS团队进行了深入沟通，会在项目主网上线后支持BCS的提取。

BCS创新的将智能合约、去中心化交易所结合在一起。主网上线即具备智能合约功能，并带有非常易用的token发行系统。主网上线后现有BTC地址除了会按1：100获得BCS，还会按同比例获得BCST。BCST为展示智能合约功能的测试代币。

项目名 Bitcoin Smart（BCS） 比特智能
分叉高度 505050
分叉时间 2018年1月20日
总量 21亿
出块时间 10分钟
难度调整 DAA
区块大小 8M
隔离验证 支持
共识机制 Equi Hash(GPU)
项目官网 http://bcs.info
项目团队 BCS团队
entry.summary: 比特智能 比特派已经跟BCS团队进行了深入沟通，会在项目主网上线后支持BCS的提取。 BCS创新的将智能合约、去中心化交易所结合在一起。主网上线即具备智能合约功能，并带有非常易用的token发行系统。主网上线后现有BTC地址除了会按1：100获得BCS，还会按同比例获得BCST。BCST为展示智能合约功能的测试代币。 项目名 Bitcoin Smart（BCS） 比特智能 分叉高度 505050 分叉时间 2018年1月20日 总量 21亿 出块时间 10分钟 难度调整 DAA 区块大小 8M 隔离验证 支持 共识机制 Equi Hash(GPU) 项目官网 http://bcs.info 项目团队 BCS团队

entry.title: qbtcdetail
entry.content:
量子比特币

针对越来越多的分叉，比特派提醒大家： 区块链分叉具备相当的技术要求，对于没有足够技术或者算力支持的分叉，是有可能最终分叉失败的。 比特派会针对每一个可能的分叉做快照，并在分叉真正成功、主网上线稳定运行一段时间之后支持该分叉币的提取。

QBTC，是Quantum Bitcoin 的缩写，中文名称：量子比特币。未来QBTC将具有全新特性，如闪电到账，加密用户隐私特权，降低交易手续费，大区块8M扩容，重放保护，支持隔离验证（SegWit），DAA难度调整机制。团队后续还会尝试POW+POS的共识机制。中期实验将会尝试兼容包括以太坊在内的各类虚拟机，同时将POW转为PoS共识机制，为商业应用落地和分布式移动应用提供更多可能性。随着对项目的不断创新，项目团队会尝试加入图灵完备的智能合约（源于以太坊的创新）以及在QBTC主链上创建新的区块链资产和应用，打造一个超级智能和高度可扩展性的量子比特币生态系统。

项目名 Quantum Bitcoin(QBTC) 量子比特币
分叉高度 未公布
分叉时间 2017年12月28日
重放保护 支持
挖矿算法 POW+POS
是否预挖 210,000
比例 1：1
总量 21,210,000
项目官网 www.quantumbitcoin.top
项目团队 张建国（冬瓜张）

entry.title: qbtcdetail
entry.content:
Quantum Bitcoin

Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim.

An experiment to combine features of Bitcoin and QTUM.

Project name Quantum Bitcoin(QBTC)
Block height Unknown
Hard-fork time 2017/12/28
Replay protection Support
Mining algorithm POW+POS
Pre-mining 210,000
Ratio to BTC 1：1
Total supply 21,210,000
Official Website www.quantumbitcoin.top
Project Team jianguozhang
entry.summary: Quantum Bitcoin Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim. An experiment to combine features of Bitcoin and QTUM. Project name Quantum Bitcoin(QBTC) Block height Unknown Hard-fork time 2017/12/28 Replay protection Support Mining algorithm POW+POS Pre-mining 210,000 Ratio to BTC 1：1 Total supply 21,210,000 Official Website www.quantumbitcoin.top Project Team jianguozhang

entry.title: bthdetail
entry.content:
Bitcoin Hot

Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim.

With new BtHash algorithm, Bitcoin Hot allows users to participate in mining by both CPU and GPU.

Project name Bitcoin Hot(BTH)
Block height 498848
Hard-fork time 2017/12/12
Replay protection Support
Mining algorithm BtHash (CPU+GPU)
Pre-mining 21,000,000
Ratio to BTC 1：100
Total supply 21.21 Billions
Official Website Unknown
Project Team Unknown

With new BtHash algorithm, Bitcoin Hot allows users to participate in mining by both CPU and GPU. entry.title: btadetail
entry.content:
Bitcoin ALL

Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim.

Bitcoin ALL has a Chinese name of bitcoin honor, refers to BTA. Everyone can mine it and everyone can trade with 0 fees instantly.

Project name Bitcoin ALL（BTA）
Fork timestamp To ensure an accurate fork time on 2018.1.1 ,the first blockhight after timestamp 1514736000 will be used as fork height.
Hard-fork time 2018/1/1 0:00
Replay protection Support
Mining algorithm AuxPOW
Pre-mining no-premining
Ratio to BTC 1：1
Total supply 2100 Millions
Official Website http://www.bitcoinall.org
Project Team BTA foundation
entry.summary: Bitcoin ALL Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim. Bitcoin ALL has a Chinese name of bitcoin honor, refers to BTA. Everyone can mine it and everyone can trade with 0 fees instantly. Project name Bitcoin ALL（BTA） Fork timestamp To ensure an accurate fork time on 2018.1.1 ,the first blockhight after timestamp 1514736000 will be used as fork height. Hard-fork time 2018/1/1 0:00 Replay protection Support Mining algorithm AuxPOW Pre-mining no-premining Ratio to BTC 1：1 Total supply 2100 Millions Official Website http://www.bitcoinall.org Project Team BTA foundation

entry.title: bthdetail
entry.content:
比特热点

针对越来越多的分叉，比特派提醒大家： 区块链分叉具备相当的技术要求，对于没有足够技术或者算力支持的分叉，是有可能最终分叉失败的。 比特派会针对每一个可能的分叉做快照，并在分叉真正成功、主网上线稳定运行一段时间之后支持该分叉币的提取。

全新的BtHash算法，能够让普通用户用CPU和GPU参与挖矿。

项目名 Bitcoin Hot(BTH) 比特热点
分叉高度 498848
分叉时间 2017年12月12日
重放保护 支持
挖矿算法 BtHash (CPU+GPU)
是否预挖 21,000,000
比例 1：100
总量 21.21亿
项目官网 未公布
项目团队 硅谷匿名团队

entry.title: btadetail
entry.content:
比特币荣耀

针对越来越多的分叉，比特派提醒大家： 区块链分叉具备相当的技术要求，对于没有足够技术或者算力支持的分叉，是有可能最终分叉失败的。 比特派会针对每一个可能的分叉做快照，并在分叉真正成功、主网上线稳定运行一段时间之后支持该分叉币的提取。

Bitcoin ALL，中文名称比特币荣耀，符号BTA。是在比特币区块高度分叉出来的无预挖无超发的分山币，定位所有矿机都可以挖矿，所有人都可以0手续费即时交易。

项目名 Bitcoin ALL（BTA） 比特币荣耀
分叉时间戳 第一个时间戳不低于1514736000的区块高度为BTA的分叉高度。从而确保较准确的元旦当天0时左右分叉。
分叉时间 2018年1月1日0点左右
重放保护 支持
挖矿算法 AuxPOW（所有矿机均可）
是否预挖 无
比例 1：1
总量 2100万
项目官网 http://www.bitcoinall.org
项目团队 BTA基金会、玛雅、赵善仁
